snippet: Every headline about a riot deepens the post-uprising crisis for Egypt’s tourism trade, a problem no amount of salesmanship by officials seems able to fix.
abstract: Many Egyptians who make their livings in ways connected to country's tourism trade have been struggling as unrest in region has caused number of visitors to drop off significantly.
lead_paragraph: Every headline about a riot deepens the post-uprising crisis for Egypt’s tourism trade, a problem no amount of salesmanship by officials seems able to fix.

headline.seo: Egyptians Struggle as Wary Tourists Stay Away
headline.main: Egyptians Struggle as Wary Tourists Stay Away
headline.print_headline: Egyptians Struggle as Wary Tourists Stay Away
